description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defend Earth from alien invasion... again! Vaderz takes you back to the golden age of alien busting games with inspiration drawn from the likes of Zalaga and Galaxians. Vaderz however, gives the genre a bit of a twist by putting all 15 levels in 3D.
description.short: Defend Earth from alien invasion... again! Vaderz takes you back to the golden age of alien busting games with inspiration drawn from the likes of Zalaga and Galaxians. Vaderz however, gives the genre a bit of a twist by putting all 15 levels in 3D.
